Depth-First.Explanation: States a precise hypothesis (Gare de Nice-Ville) and immediately uses observed clues to support it, indicating targeted verification.
Confirms and refines the hypothesis by citing authoritative sources (French and English Wikipedia) and specifying the neighborhood.
Gathers and details multiple visual and published clues to systematically corroborate the single station hypothesis.
Delivers the final concise location summary, closing the convergent verification process.
